title: r-deckgl Gallery

This website is designed to show [r-deckgl](https://github.com/crazycapivara/deckgl) examples.

## Get Started

```{r message = FALSE}
library(deckgl)

data("sf_bike_parking")

html <- paste(
  "<p>Grid Layer</p>",
  "<p>Use the editor to change layer props.</p>",
  "<p>Press <span style='color: #ba2313;'>e</span> when focused on the map to show / hide the editor."
)

deckgl(
  bearing = 35, pitch = 45, zoom = 12,
  width = "100%", height = "500px",
  style = list(background = "black")
) %>%
  add_grid_layer(
    data = sf_bike_parking,
    getPosition = ~lng + lat,
    cellSize = 300,
    extruded = TRUE,
    elevationScale = 4,
    colorRange = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(6, "YlOrBr"),
    colorScaleType = "ordinal",
    visible = TRUE,
    tooltip = "Count: {{points.length}}"
  ) %>%
  add_control(html, pos = "top-right") %>%
  add_json_editor()
```
